main_definition: Findings refer to the results or discoveries made during an investigation, research, or examination.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Results of a scientific study or experiment
meanings_and_examples.example: The findings from the clinical trial showed that the new drug was effective in treating patients with high blood pressure.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Information gathered during an investigation, such as a police inquiry or legal case
meanings_and_examples.example: During the autopsy, several findings were made which indicated that the cause of death was due to blunt force trauma.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The results or conclusions drawn from an analysis or examination
meanings_and_examples.example: After reviewing all the evidence, the detective shared his findings with the rest of the team.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Facts uncovered by a report or study
meanings_and_examples.example: The environmental impact assessment presented several key findings that could affect local wildlife.
